author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011792/

The die has been cast... Lost in Random: The Eternal Die is coming to PS5 on June 17! 

Step back into the gothic fairytale world of Random, where an ancient evil awaits. Play as Queen Aleksandra and her loyal die-companion, Fortune, in this fast-paced action-roguelite where you'll battle nightmarish foes, wield powerful relics and abilities, and roll the dice to face the dark force threatening everything - Mare the Knight.

Pre-order the Fortune Edition to play early on June 13 and be among the first to experience this dark fantasy adventure!

#ps5 #ps5games #lostinrandom
title: Lost in Random: The Eternal Die - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011132/

Join Ramila and Ryleth on their crusade to reclaim their home from demonic forces in this unique physics-based side-scrolling game.
Get ready for a celestial adventure! You are the Aureole: Move, jump, and reach dizzying speeds with precise controls that have been polished to perfection.

The kingdom of heaven, centuries after devils had been exiled to the underworld, is being conquered by the demonic army led by Lazel, the new Demon King.
Our angelic protagonists, Ramila and Ryleth, fall down from the kingdom and get stranded in the surface with a single goal in mind: It’s time to return home!

Features

- Unique Mechanics: Easy to learn, difficult to master. Launch yourself, accelerate, and use the environment to your advantage with precise physics-based controls. But be careful – physics can be fickle, and you may find yourself at their mercy.
- Arcade Mode: Like in classic games! Experience the most straightforward perspective and t
title: Aureole - Wings of Hope - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010772

Shovel Knight Dig has tunneled onto PS5! This ultimate edition includes the complete game and all downloadable content.

When Drill Knight and his dastardly digging crew blast apart Shovel Knight’s peaceful campsite and steal his loot, he grabs his trusty Shovel Blade and starts tunneling after them! But as he and Shield Knight soon discover, this adventure goes much deeper than a simple heist…
Meet new friends and foes, visit strange lands, and outfit yourself in your quest to keep the entire land from collapsing underfoot! Jump, slash, and dig your way down an ever-changing chasm of mystery in Shovel Knight Dig, an all-new Shovel Knight adventure!

Fate & Fortune FREE DLC:
Something truly evil must be brewing down in the well, and it’s up to Shovel Knight and Black Knight to uncover the true Knightmare and put a stop to it! Once you’ve completed the base game, Knightmare Mode will unlock, adding a whole new level of challenge.

W
title: Shovel Knight Dig - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

Embark on a series of brand-new quests as you help the Painter finish his artistic magnum opus. In return for your deadly endeavours, you'll be able to choose from over 100 unique shield designs and earn a new set of gear for Henry.

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009136

Narrative-driven cat adventure "Copycat" is coming to PS5. Copycat is an indie game about a pet who learns to deal with abandonment, and a human forced to surrender. Together, two souls go on a journey to discover the meaning of family and home. The game's colourful visuals delight the senses while exploring dark thematic depths. Journey on an emotional rollercoaster that pulls at the heartstrings and reminds you how it feels to be left behind.

#ps5 #ps5games #copycat
title: Copycat - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Rock out today: https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/synth-riders/

SYNTH RIDERS - 90s ROCK MUSIC PACK SETLIST:
●      Red Hot Chili Peppers - Give It Away
●      Blur - Song 2
●      Soundgarden - Black Hole Sun
●      Radiohead - Creep
●      The Presidents of the United States of America - Lump

“Synth Riders has brought together a wide variety of music genres over the years: EDM, Electroswing, punk, metal, soul, funk, 80s bangers, modern hits – now grunge, brit rock, and other 90s artists join the mix. We’ve always considered Synth Riders a musical discovery and enjoyment platform. It’s a different way to experience your music, just in time for the summer concert season.”
Arturo Perez, CEO of Kluge Interactive

Synth Riders kicked off 2025 with the 80s Mixtape - Side B (featuring Queen, Toto, and Wham!), followed by the Kendrick Lamar HUMBLE. Experience ahead of Super Bowl LIX and the Current Waves music pack hitting all Mixed Reality platforms. The team isn’t letting up any ti
title: Synth Riders - 90s Rock Music Pack Gameplay Video | PS5 & PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10014441

Garten of Banban 0 is out on Playstation!

What is this place?
Who are you?
You’ll have to discover the answers on your journey through the facility.
Piece together the truth to uncover what’s really going on here.

Survive the dark past of Banban’s Kindergarten - travel back in time to explore the origins of the establishment.
Only you can connect the dots to understand its true nature.

But it’s dangerous to go alone - make some friends along the way!
After all, this is your new home.
Get out of your cell and meet your fellow neighbors.
Everythi-... Everyone here is full of love and eager to be your friend!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #gartenofbanban #gartenofbanban0
title: Garten of Banban 0 - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

Experience the extraordinary story of Trevor, an average man escaping from the world's most popular reality tv show. American Arcadia is out now on PlayStation 5!

#ps5 #ps5games #americanarcadia
title: American Arcadia - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10013464

Set foot on a cursed Caribbean island in search of the legendary Davy Jones and his vanished treasure. Explore sun-drenched beaches, ancient caves, and submerged ruins in this cinematic, single-player pirate adventure—brought to life through the immersive power of PlayStation VR2.

Climb, swim, and solve puzzles as you uncover secrets and face off against cursed foes. With your trusty tools and your loudmouthed parrot companion, every step of the journey feels like living inside a swashbuckling storybook.

Developed by @SplitLightStudio and published by @VRKiwi, Pirates VR: Jolly Roger is a heartfelt tribute to classic pirate tales—with a modern VR twist.

Available now on PS VR2.

#ps5 #psvr2 #psvr2games
title: Pirates VR: Jolly Roger - Launch Trailer | PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10007649/

TIEBREAK+: Official Game of the ATP and WTA is now available on PlayStation!

Step onto the court like never before with TIEBREAK+, the most authentic and content-rich tennis game ever made. Developed by Big Ant Studios and published by NACON, TIEBREAK+ delivers the ultimate tennis experience, now on PlayStation, with all the content and updates released since its original launch in August 2024.

🎮 NEW: Rivalry Mode - Relive the iconic battles between Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal.
👑 Play as or against 140+ pro tennis legends including Djokovic, Alcaraz, Swiatek, Sharapova, and more.
🛡️ Take on the Novak Djokovic Slam Challenge and rewrite tennis history.
🌐 Compete online with full cross-platform play.
💼 Build your legacy in Career Mode with 90+ official tournaments, press conferences, and rivalry dynamics.

🎾 Available now on PlayStation!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #tiebreaktennis
title: Tiebreak+: Official Game of the ATP and WTA - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
NTE (Neverness to Everness), from urban exploration and anomaly containment to street racing and even simulation management—all in this supernatural urban open world!

Welcome to Hethereau, Appraiser!
The life of an anomaly hunter isn't easy—so stay sharp and watch out for the strange and unusual.
Feeling a bit lost starting out? Don't worry—our friends at Sterry Express are always ready to lend a hand.
You'll get the hang of containment in no time. Keep your eyes open—and don't miss the Nexus!

NTE Pre-Registration Is Live — Welcome to Hethreau!  

#ps5 #ps5games #NTE
title: NTE - Containment Begins Now! | PS5 Games
